DOC.brief_summary: Investigate effect multiple oral dos BI 207127 + faldaprevir ( FDV ) multiple dose pharmacokinetics ethinylestradiol levonorgestrel ( MicrogynonÂ® ) healthy premenopausal female volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Effect BI 207127 + Faldaprevir Blood Levels Oral Contraceptives Containing Ethinylestradiol Levonorgestrel
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy female subject Age 18 35 year ( inclusive ) Body Mass Index 2029.9 kg/m2 Use hormonal contraception ( i.e . oral contraceptive , hormonal contraceptive vaginal ring , hormonecontaining intrauterine device , depot injection contraceptive implant ) Exclusion criterion : Any relevant deviation healthy condition Subject assess investigator unsuitable inclusion , instance , consider able understand comply study requirement , condition would allow safe participation study Positive pregnancy test , pregnancy plan become pregnant within 1 month study completion , lactation Any relevant finding gynaecological examination Thrombotic predisposition accord thrombophilic test Existing history arterial thrombotic embolic process , condition predispose e.g . disorder clot process , valvular heart disease atrial fibrillation Existing history confirm venous thromboembolism , family history venous thromboembolism , know risk factor venous thromboembolism . Relevant varicosis No use additional contraceptive method screen examination 1 month last study drug administration ( acceptable method consider barrier method , sexual abstinence , nonhormonecontaining intrauterine device , vasectomisation male partner ) . Use hormonecontaining intrauterine device , depot injection contraceptive implant Any history relevant liver disease ( e.g . disturbance liver function , jaundice persistent itch previous pregnancy , DubinJohnson syndrome , Rotor syndrome , previous exist liver tumour ) AST ( aspartate transaminase ) and/or ALT ( alanine transaminase ) > 1.5 ULN ( upper limit normal )
